title: Lala Kent, A Kidnapping Hoax, and Josh Flagg Divorce
description:
Lala Kent shares about her single life. Million Dollar Listing LA stars, Josh Flagg and Bobby Boyd are getting divorced. Married Mom, Sherri Papini has been arrested for faking her own disappearance. Prosecutors are saying that she was actually with her boyfriend in the OC during the three weeks she was missing. Shanna Moakler is pregnant and her ex-boyfriend AKA baby daddy has quite a history. An actor faints on stage. The Dropout’s first episode is out. Real Housewives of Miami reunion reveals Julia’s sad past. RHSLC reunion explores Lisa’s hot mic rant. RHOC cruelest husband scene. Who severed head is in Kanye’s video? Is there a cult of Tik Tok dancers? Too many topics to list, enjoy!

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free

Or get access to Extra Juicy on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/juicyscoop
